original_text: But thou, O son of man, behold, they shall put bands upon thee, and shall bind thee with them, and thou shalt not go out among them:
korean_text: 너 인자야 보라 무리가 네 위에 줄을 놓아 너를 동여매리니 네가 그들 가운데에서 나오지 못할 것이라

sentences.original_text: But thou, O son of man, behold
they shall put bands upon thee
and shall bind thee with them
and thou shalt not go out among them:
